bill.title: Sewer connection matters. Provides that a not-for-profit public sewer utility or a regional sewage district may not require a property owner to connect to the utility's or district's sewer system if certain conditions are met. Requires a not-for-profit public sewer utility or regional sewage district to: (1) provide property owners with a form for use in applying for an exemption under those certain conditions; (2) respond in writing to each exemption application; (3) if denying an application, explain to the applicant why the application is denied and what steps the applicant must take to qualify for the exemption; and (4)
